name: Dominature Beta
description:
A local multiplayer battle arena game for 2-4 players, where you compete against rival Commanders to capture their towers using your ever-growing horde of minions. This game is free from the steep learning curve associated with MOBAs, with fast-paced 5-15 minute battles. Dominate the ecosystem on a galactic space whale!

WARNING: Best Played with controllers.

Report A Bug

After playing a few times, please fill out our Feedback Form

Thanks for playing!

FIREWALLS: Our program uses online analytics to collect player data that we use for balancing and improving player experience, however this is sometimes blocked by firewalls. Allowing Dominature through your firewall would give us more data and allow us to improve the game,  however not allowing this would not impede your gameplay in any way.
